text: The Rally for the Development of Burkina (, RDB) was a political party in Burkina Faso led by Celestin Saidou Compaoré.Political parties and leaders CIA World Factbook ==History== In April 2005 it joined the Convention of Democratic Forces together with the Convention for Democracy and Federation and the Greens of Burkina. In the 2007 parliamentary elections it won 2 of the 111 seats in the National Assembly. It was reduced to one seat in the 2012 elections. ==References== Category:Defunct political parties in Burkina Faso
title: Rally for the Development of Burkina
